::: {.cell}

::: {.cell}

### Version history

This page provides information about older or alternative versions of  indicative distribution map for this ecosystem functional group [**{{< meta params.efgname >}}**](/efg-info/FM1_1.qmd).
Check the current maps [here](/map-info/FM1_1_valid.qmd).

- Web navigation (**code: FM1.1.web.alt**, version v3.0) replaced 
 - Indicative Map (**code: FM1.1.IM.alt**, version v2.0) discarded 
 - Indicative Map (**code: FM1.1.IM.orig**, version v1.0) discarded 
 - Web navigation (**code: FM1.1.web.orig**, version v1.0) requires review 

### Datasets

Datasets considered for previous versions of the indicative map

- **Coastal-Typology-2011** (Durr et al 2011).
 - **GeoNames-2020** (GeoNames 2020).
 - **GSFM-2014** (Harris PT et al. 2014).
 - **MEOW-2008** (Spalding MD et al.  2008).
 - **SCAR-gazetteer-2020** (SCAR 1992).
 - **SRTM30-PLUS-V11** (Becker et al. 2009).

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}


|dataset               |url                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|:---------------------|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|Coastal-Typology-2011 |<http://geotypes.net/downloads.html>{target='links'}                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
|GSFM-2014             |<http://www.bluehabitats.org/?page_id=9>{target='links'} :: <https://www.grida.no/publications/112>{target='links'} :: <https://www.dropbox.com/s/jvaprrz8snnzvfo/global%20seafloor%20geomorphic%20features%20map.zip?dl=0>{target='links'}                                             |

|SCAR-gazetteer-2020   |<https://data.aad.gov.au/aadc/gaz/scar/information.cfm>{target='links'} :: <https://data.aad.gov.au/aadc/gaz/scar/>{target='links'}                                                                                                                                                     |
|SRTM30-PLUS-V11       |<ftp://topex.ucsd.edu/pub/srtm30_plus/>{target='links'} :: <https://topex.ucsd.edu/WWW_html/srtm30_plus.html>{target='links'}                                                                                                                                                           |


:::
:::

### Available files

You can download geospatial data for older versions of these maps from the following sources:

**FM1.1.web.alt** (v3.0): [GitHub repository](https://github.com/red-list-ecosystem/typology-map-data/blob/master/data/layers/FM1.1.web.alt_v3.0_topo.json){target="gisdata"}

**FM1.1.IM.orig** (v1.0): [Zenodo repository (EFG map)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3958622){target="gisdata"}

**FM1.1.web.orig** (v1.0): [GitHub repository](https://github.com/red-list-ecosystem/typology-map-data/blob/master/data/layers/FM1.1.web.orig_topo.json){target="gisdata"}

Note that you need to login to some services like [mapbox](https://www.mapbox.com){target="links"} or [earthengine](https://earthengine.google.com){target="links"}, and in some cases you also need to request access to the files.

###  License information

Indicative maps have been released with a ![](https://zenodo.org/static/icons/licenses/cc-by-icon.svg){height=20} Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International license. 

But see details of dataset licenses below:

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}

## References

References used in these versions of the maps.

- Secretariat SCAR (1992, updated 2020). *Composite Gazetteer of Antarctica*, **Scientific Committee on Antarctic Research**. [GCMD Metadata](http://gcmd.nasa.gov/records/SCAR_Gazetteer.html) 
 - Dürr, H. H., G. G. Laruelle, C. M. van Kempen, C. P. Slomp, M. Meybeck and H. Middelkoop  (2011) *Worldwide Typology of Nearshore Coastal Systems: Defining the Estuarine Filter of River Inputs to the Oceans* **Estuaries and Coasts** 34(3), 441-458 [DOI:10.1007/s12237-011-9381-y](http:dx.doi.org/10.1007/s12237-011-9381-y) 
 - Spalding MD, Fox HE, Allen GR, Davidson N, Ferdaña ZA, Finlayson M, Halpern BS, Jorge MA, Lombana A, Lourie SA, Martin KD, McManus E, Molnar J, Recchia CA, Robertson J (2007) *Marine ecoregions of the world: a bioregionalization of coastal and shelf areas*. **Bioscience** 57: 573–583. DOI:[10.1641/B570707](https://doi.org/10.1641/B570707)
  
 - GeoNames  (2020) **The GeoNames geographical database** [https://www.geonames.org] Accessed in Feb 2020 
 - Becker JJ, Sandwell DT, Smith WHF, Braud J, Binder B, Depner J, Fabre D, Factor J, Ingalls S, Kim S-H, Ladner R, Marks K, Nelson S, Pharaoh A, Trimmer R, Von Rosenberg J, Wallace G, Weatherall P (2009) *Global Bathymetry and Elevation Data at 30 Arc Seconds Resolution: SRTM30_PLUS*, **Marine Geodesy** 32: 355-371. DOI:[10.1080/01490410903297766](https://doi.org/10.1080/01490410903297766) 
 - Harris PT, Macmillan-Lawler M, Rupp J, Baker EK (2014) *Geomorphology of the oceans*. **Marine Geology** 352: 4-24. [10.1016/j.margeo.2014.01.011](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.margeo.2014.01.011)
